titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Fales Library and Special Collections Audio/Video Collection
1960-2011
MSS 306
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Ashley Todd, 2011.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-04-26T16:52-0400

did.unittitle: Fales Library and Special Collections Audio/Video Collection

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into two series by format and items are arranged alphabetically by title. The dates used are the items' copyright years.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); Fales Library and Special Collection Audio/Video Collection; MSS 306; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the Director of Fales Library and Special Collections. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu. or call 212 998 2596.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains primarily commerically released audio and video materials relating to the Fales Library and Special Collections.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This series contains audio materials on audiocassette and CD including audiobooks, readings and interviews.

odd.p:
Content:
1. "What's Up in New York?" - Show #106
2. CBS This Morning - 30 July, 1992
3. HBO - Night After Night - 14 August, 1992
4. Fox "Style News" (WNYN) - 10 August, 1992
5. Channel 2 News (WCBS) - 6 August, 1992
6. ABC News - World News Now - 13 August, 1992
